translations: 打；抽出；征服；使突然摔倒

sentences.sentence: He gave Jimmy a whop showing his anger.
sentences.translation: 他愤怒地打了吉米一拳。

sentences.sentence: I even had an eventful "crash" at the appropriate time during the song. Oh, and there were "Doo Whop" girls on stage too!
sentences.translation: 我甚至可以在大家的歌声中表扬他们，啊，还有一个女孩子在舞台上歌唱呢。
